spflow 0.1.0

License

The content of the package is licensed under GPL 3 (https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/GPL-3)

Some of the data contained in the package is derived from third party sources and the derived data is relicensed under GPL 3.
Below you find license information of the original data sources.


Paris municipalities
--------------------

Information on the geography and population of the municipalities is provided by 'OpenDataSoft' and licensed with an OPEN LICENCE.
The specific dataset was accessed on 2021-05-05 and can be found at https://public.opendatasoft.com/explore/dataset/code-postal-code-insee-2015/export/?flg=fr&location=2,18.52839,-2.98471&basemap=jawg.streets

For more information on the previously mentioned license see the following links:
https://www.etalab.gouv.fr/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/open-licence.pdf
https://www.etalab.gouv.fr/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Licence_Ouverte.pdf

Information about the number of commuters, the median income and number of companies come from three data sets provided by INSEE.
More information on the rights to use and diffuse this data is provided on their website (https://www.insee.fr/fr/information/2008466).
The data can be found at the following addresses (last accessed 2021-05-05):
    * Commute flows (https://www.insee.fr/fr/statistiques/fichier/3566477/base-texte-flux-mobilite-domicile-lieu-travail-2015.zip)
    * Number of companies (https://www.insee.fr/fr/statistiques/2021271)
    * Median income (https://www.insee.fr/fr/statistiques/3560121)



Stylized geographies of the USA and Germany
-------------------------------------------

This data is generated by the authors of the package, who follow the examples of Yang et. al. (2017).
If you use this data please cite this package and the following reference:

Y. Yang, T. Dwyer, S. Goodwin and K. Marriott, "Many-to-Many Geographically-Embedded Flow Visualisation: An Evaluation," in IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Computer Graphics, vol. 23, no. 1, pp. 411-420, Jan. 2017, doi: 10.1109/TVCG.2016.2598885.
